metadata.title: Summertime by The Shore by Décor&More Extra Soft Microplush Throw Blanket (50" x 60") - Lighthouse
features: ✔️ Add a touch of summer to your home with this ultra soft microplush throw blanket!
✔️ Measures 50" x 60" just the right size for watching TV, reading, snuggling, as a play mat on the ground, or as a throw blanket on the couch enjoying family time
✔️ 100% Polyester Fabric which is strong, durable, lightweight and resistant to shrinking and wrinkling. Soft plush blanket that stays the same as new after washing.
✔️ Machine washable in cold water, low temperature drying, easy care for kids blanket. Avoid direct heat. Do not use bleach. Throw blanket beach theme that is easy to clean.

✔️ A perfect gift for your child, friend, niece, nephew, grandson or granddaughter. Great gift for birthdays, graduation, Christmas, Hanukkah, Easter, or any holiday. A thoughtful gift that will be a hit.
description: Add style to your home with this ultra soft microplush throw blanket. Measuring at 50" x 60", this Lighthouse microplush Throw will allow you to relax and unwind under its warm and comfort. Simply kick back on your couch, bed, sofa or chair and cuddle in on the ultra-soft cozy blankets. Purposefully light weight to meet your traveling needs. Stow it away in your backpack or luggage for ultimate comfort in a car, bus or plane. Perfect for snuggling with family while enjoying a hot cup of coffee or hot cocoa and watching television. Ultra soft material and elegant colors bring a calm and elegant touch to any room.
